mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, userId, roleId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO im_role_user ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, userId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{roleId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE im_role_user
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
userId = #{userId},
roleId = #{roleId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE im_role_user
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
userId = #{map.userId},
roleId = #{map.roleId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_role_user ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, userId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.userId}, #{map.roleId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM im_role_user
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
AND roleId like CONCAT('%', #{roleId} , '%')
